title:
Get a database connection as defined by a yaml configuration
or environment variables — get_connection
text: db_params db_params.yaml-file defines db_host, db_name db_user db_secret db_secret.yaml-file defines db_pass optionally overrides values bigint connection convert bigints ... arguments passed DBI::dbConnect(),
